Description: You unleash a devastating, concentrated blast of flame at a single target in range. Make a ranged attack roll, doing fire damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 10 or more, the target is burned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
